LanguageData.AEXP_Hyena.label: hyena
LanguageData.AEXP_Hyena.description: A large dog-like carnivore most often found in the shrublands and deserts. A common trope in tribal legends, the laughter produced by these animals can sow fear during the long desert nights.
LanguageData.AEXP_Hyena_Leather.label: hyena leather
LanguageData.AEXP_Hyena_Meat.label: hyena meat
LanguageData.AEXP_Hyena_Corpse.label: hyena corpse
LanguageData.AEXP_DesertTortoise.label: desert tortoise
LanguageData.AEXP_DesertTortoise.description: This heavily armored desert-dwelling reptile is known for its slow moving speed and extremely hard, flat domed shell, making it tough to kill. Desert tortoises, despite their small size, are great combat animals and are relatively easy to tame.
LanguageData.AEXP_DesertTortoise_Leather.label: desert tortoise leather
LanguageData.AEXP_DesertTortoise_Corpse.label: desert tortoise corpse
LanguageData.AEXP_Lion.label: lion
LanguageData.AEXP_Lion.description: A king of the animal kingdom, a lion is a muscular, deep-chested cat with a short head and a prominent mane. Being the biggest of the cat species, lions are excellent combat animals despite their wildness.
LanguageData.AEXP_Lion_Leather.label: lion leather
LanguageData.AEXP_Lion_Meat.label: lion meat
LanguageData.AEXP_Lion_Corpse.label: lion corpse
LanguageData.AEXP_GilaMonster.label: gila monster
LanguageData.AEXP_GilaMonster.description: A large, slow moving type of lizard found mostly in the desert, known for it's highly venomous bite which inflicts a severe toxic build-up in it's prey. Outlanders to this day believe in tales which state that this lizard is a spawn from hell, and that it's foul breath is lethal.
LanguageData.AEXP_GilaMonster_Leather.label: gila monster leather
LanguageData.AEXP_GilaMonster_Corpse.label: gila monster corpse
